articles.author: Meredith Lee Hill, Adam Wren
articles.title: Johnson bullish on Indiana’s upcoming nailbiter of a redistricting vote - Politico
articles.description: The House speaker has been conferring with Hoosier State Republicans, but taking a lighter touch than the White House.
articles.content: Well, because theyre in the final stages of that process, Johnson told POLITICO Wednesday night, explaining why he made the calls. And I was told that there was some Indiana state senators who would … [+2019 chars]

articles.author: Jill Martin
articles.title: ‘Dadgummit, let’s freaking go’ – Philip Rivers returns to the NFL with Colts - CNN
articles.description: “I had not given any thought of playing again until about 48 hours ago, to be honest with you,” a candid Philip Rivers said while standing in front a group of reporters at the Indianapolis Colts facility.
